Ugly House to Lovely House: Series 1

Technology Documentary hosted by George Clarke, published by Channel 4 in 2016 - English narration

Information
------------------------------

Ugly House To Lovely House: Series 1
George Clarke and leading architects show that even the ugliest house can be transformed into a home to be proud of, proving that great design doesn't have to cost the earth




5)  Croydon 
Award-winning architect Jo Cowen, who has worked on projects including the British Museum and the JP Morgan tower at Canary Wharf, is called in to help Croydon couple Denise and Ali breathe new life into their uninspiring council house. She plans a striking glazed extension, and comes up with a further idea for the upstairs that requires an extra Â£40,000 on top of the not inconsiderable Â£120,000 budget. But problems begin to appear, pushing the couple to the brink.
